title: Romantic Wedding anniversary in Paris -
text: Perfect location to explore Paris and all the great attractions. Take a taxi from Gard de Nord for 15â‚¬ to the hotel. Bedrooms very comfortable, great nights sleep. Staff very welcoming. One down side, was that our room did not have a view of the rue, however very quiet,
